page.title: 02Housing.
page.content: I live in a house that was built over a hundred years ago.It was built for the manager of the brickworks.It stands at the side of the canal.The brickworks used to be next door to my house.The bricks that my house is built from,are a light greyish colour.Some of the outside pieces of the bricks are cracked.The bricks are a bit irregular they are not as neat as new bricks. The house has a big chimney stack.It has four fireplaces.There is one in each bedroom upstairs and there is one in the two rooms downstairs.Last year we had to have some new floors put in the bedrooms upstairs as the wooden beams had become unsafe.My dad has built my sister and I a playroom in a shed behind the house. Jason Burkinshaw.
